snippet: Next year's Ultra Music Festival will run the weekends of March 15-17 and March 22-24 in Bayfront Park in Miami.
abstract: Next year's Ultra Music Festival will run the weekends of March 15-17 and March 22-24 in Bayfront Park in Miami.

headline.main: Miami's Ultra Music Festival Expands to Two Weekends
headline.print_headline: Miami Music Festival  Expands to 2 Weekends
